__e: You still look hungry and beat, just like the first time I saw you.
And I don't wanna hear any of this, "Ooh, I can't go there" stuff, okay?
So all I gotta do is starve and be miserable for a week, then my life will go back to the normal hell it always was?
! Or are you sick, because you're starving for $3,217 worth of this!
There's some kind of life nearby that's violent and out for blood.
You know, sometimes I think it's wrong of me to keep you all to myself in a world starved for beauty.
It's just because I'm a little more hungry than you, that's all.
Each one of you has to decide that you want this so bad that you're so hungry that nothing's gonna stand in your way.
